title: Chelsea Football Club
creator_credit: British Information Services and Frank Gardner
brief_description: Behind the scenes and on the field with the Chelsea Football Club. The men and methods behind the organization of this well-known club are pictured, and the training required for players in both the main and reserve teams is described. Ends with an exciting Saturday afternoon league game.
